Class TreeVariable

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecisionNode, ProbabilisticNode
public abstract class TreeVariable
extends Node

Interface para variáveis que serão visualizadas na árvore. Interface para o DecisionNode e ProbabilisticNode.
